summary: REQ-10, REQ-11, and REQ-12 appear implemented via centralized content updates, footer rendering of the site URL as a link, and a new custom-domain documentation file. REQ-9 is implemented in the Home hero area, but the Arabic string in the diff does not exactly match the required text (minor diacritic differences), so the “exact text” acceptance criterion may not be met.

missing_requirements.requirement: Home page must display the exact Arabic Bismillah text: “بِسْمِ اللّٰهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ”.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage includes a Bismillah line in the hero, but the literal string shown differs from the required exact text (uses “الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ” instead of “الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ”). This may fail the exact-match AC.
